person.persName: Marshall R. Stone (Bath County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Matilda Stone. Married to Mary Newland Stone in Bath County, Kentucky, on August 18, 1853. Father of Phaley Stone, Artemesia Stone, and William D. Stone. Farmer in Bath County in 1860. Owned two enslaved persons in Bath County in 1860.
